resources.string: How are you living each day? How is your day today? Are you diligently living each day in accordance to your goal? Well if not, don\'t worry. \"Very Good\" offers the opportunity to reflect back on yourself and help you reach your life goal.

Very simple. Tap "Very Good" if you feel satisfied with your efforts after looking back at your day (you can add a short comment if you tap and hold long enough). We also provide you with a calendar where you can see your monthly/yearly progress.

So why exactly should you use this app? There are days when you go to sleep in disappointment and regret, and other days when you feel like you\'ve accomplished something great. Truth is, we all have those days. Moreover, there are times when you look at yourself through other people\'s eyes and find how unconfident you are with your own life. Discover yourself and rebuild your motivation through this application.
"Very Good" makes time you can feedback yourself.
If you satisfied your day by day, just touch the "Very Good"
You can see how many u touched the "Very Good" on month /year
I\'m sure you understood how you use this app. And... we gotta go.
